  • Help

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Backend
Used for all backend parts to manage and calculate some elements.
Balls
Definition of the balls backend which will be used by BallsSimulator.
BallsSimulator
Definition of the class which manages the balls simulation by drawing them.
Boids
Abstract class which represents the skeleton for boids.
BoidsBackend
Definition of the boids backend which will be used by BoidsSimulator.
BoidsEvil
Evil boids class which extends Boids.
BoidsKind
Kind boids class which extends Boids.
BoidsSimulator
Definition of the class which manages the boids simulation by drawing them.
Cell
Abstract class which represents the skeleton for a cell.
CellConway
Class of cells corresponding to the game of life, inherited from Cells.
CellImmigration
Class of cells corresponding to the game of Immigration, inherited from Cells.
CellSchelling
Class of cells corresponding to the game of Schelling, inherited from Cells.
Event
Abstract class to create events.
EventManager
Manage events by their dates.
Grid
Management of the grid backend common to all cell games.
GridSimulator
Management of the grid display common to all cell games.
MessageEvent
A simple event that prints its date and a message when executed.
Simulator
Abstract class for the management of the display for all games.
SimulatorEvent
The main event that links the Simulator, the Backend and the EventManager
TestBalls
Class to test the class Balls.
TestBallsSimulator
Class to test the class BallsSimulator.
TestBoidsSimulator
Class to test the class Boids.
TestEventManager
Class to test the class EventManager.
TestGameOfLife
Class to test the game of Life of Conway composed of GridSimulator which implements the interface Simulable using GUI, Grid, CellConway and Cell.
TestGUI
Test of the GUISimulator.
TestImmigration
Class to test the game of 'Immigration' composed of GridSimulator who implements the interface Simulable using GUI, Grid, CellImmigration and Cell.
TestSchelling
Class to test the game of Schelling composed of GridSimulator who implements the interface Simulable using GUI, Grid, CellISchelling and Cell.
Triangle
Class Triangle to represents boids by triangle.
Vector
Class Vector, which implements a 2D math vector.
